markdownRemark.html:
Nobody thought I could ever do it. I had a really lame, “Coming Soon” placeholder that pointed to the blog and photo blog for months. Yet I finally got some stuff together and created a radical homepage/portal thing for all my stuff.

There’s still plenty of work to be done, and lots of stuff isn’t finished yet, but I figured it was still alright to publish.

It aggregates all the blogs I maintain (personal, photo, work), and will soon list all of the stuff I do on Twitter, Facebook, Flickr, and more.
